name: Drone Dystopia
description:
Oh, hello. Welcome to the world. You are a drone. My job is to teach you to fly. Oh, what's that? You want to know your life's purpose? Umm... You deliver packages...

"Drone Dystopia" is a game about trying your best to pilot an unstable drone through a fairly contrived cityscape. Fly through a beautiful city with a nice color scheme, fight strong winds with your mighty propellors, and live your entire life working as a delivery drone for FedEx.

A - Move Left

D - Move Right

R - Restart

S - Skip Level

This game was created by Nikos Plugachev for Geta Game Jam #12.

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC99fkt2bFCfjzUrTL0uzolQ
